snippet: Mr. Sherman and his brother, Richard M. Sherman, wrote the scores for “Mary Poppins” and “Chitty Chitty Bang Bang,” and won two Academy Awards for their music.
abstract: Robert B Sherman, songwriter who with his brother Richard co-wrote dozens of Disney songs that became beloved standards, dies at age 86.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Sherman and his brother, Richard M. Sherman, wrote the scores for “Mary Poppins” and “Chitty Chitty Bang Bang,” and won two Academy Awards for their music.

headline.seo: Robert B. Sherman, Songwriter for Disney, Dies at 86
headline.main: Robert B. Sherman, a Songwriter for Disney and Others, Dies at 86
headline.print_headline: Robert B. Sherman, a Songwriter For Disney and Others, Dies at 86
